Hightail

Mover and Hightail

Introducing another way to send & share your files – Mover is proud to partner with Hightail (formerly YouSendIt)!

Hightail is an extremely useful service for businesses. They offer multi-device access, collaboration tools, and the ability to share large files and folders.

You can use Mover and Hightail together to:

  • Get to work. Move files you want to share or collaborate on from multiple cloud services into Hightail.
  • Save valuable space. Migrate large amounts of business data for easy archiving.
  • Protect what matters. Schedule regular backups of your cloud accounts into Hightail.

Mover and Hightail are both steadfast with customer security. Every transfer is completed securely and we are both constantly improving our security practices.
